mapper.insert: insert into board_table1(boardWriter, boardWriterId, boardTitle, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardWriterId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
insert into board_file_table1(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select boardId, boardWriter, boardTitle, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i%s") as createdAt, boardHits from board_table1 order by boardId desc limit #{start}, #{limit}
select count(boardId) as count from board_table1 where ${type} Like CONCAT('%',#{q},'%')
